synopsis.text: Aspiring to become the greatest horse girl in Japan, Special Week, a high school girl with equine features, leaves her rural life behind to join the prestigious Tracen Academy in Tokyo. In this world, legendary racehorses are reborn as 'horse girls,' retaining their speed and endurance while gaining human forms. At Tracen, these girls train to excel in both racing and idol stardom. Special Week's journey takes an exciting turn when she encounters Silence Suzuka, whose elegant racing style captivates her. Determined to race alongside her new idol, Special Week joins Silence Suzuka's team, Spica, and sets her sights on winning the Twinkle Series to claim the title of the country's top horse girl.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
